description: Returns information about an array of TableRestoreStatus objects.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If your initial ListTableRestoreStatus operation returns a nextToken, you can include the returned nextToken in following ListTableRestoreStatus operations. This will returns results on the next page.

nested_items.name: tableRestoreStatuses
nested_items.description: The array of returned TableRestoreStatus objects.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message that explains the returned status. For example, if the status of the operation is FAILED, the message explains why the operation failed.

nested_items.name: namespaceName
nested_items.description: The namespace of the table being restored from.

nested_items.name: newTableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table to create from the restore operation.

nested_items.name: progressInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data restored to the new table so far, in megabytes (MB).

nested_items.name: recoveryPointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the recovery point being restored from.

nested_items.name: requestTime
nested_items.description: The time that the table restore request was made, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: snapshotName
nested_items.description: The name of the snapshot being restored from.

nested_items.name: sourceDatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the source database being restored from.

nested_items.name: sourceSchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the source schema being restored from.

nested_items.name: sourceTableName
nested_items.description: The name of the source table being restored from.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: A value that describes the current state of the table restore request. Possible values are SUCCEEDED, FAILED, CANCELED, PENDING, and IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: tableRestoreRequestId
nested_items.description: The ID of the RestoreTableFromSnapshot request.

nested_items.name: targetDatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database to restore to.

nested_items.name: targetSchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the schema to restore to.

nested_items.name: totalDataInMegaBytes
nested_items.description: The total amount of data to restore to the new table, in megabytes (MB).

nested_items.name: workgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup being restored from.
